description: Replace NVDA native unpleasant progress bars, and provide waveforms including sine wave, triangle wave, sawtooth wave, and various fading algorithms to make the progress bars pleasant

translations.description: Replace NVDA native unpleasant progress bars, and provide waveforms including sine wave, triangle wave, sawtooth wave, and various fading algorithms to make the progress bars pleasant
替换 NVDA 原生的刺耳进度条声音，提供包括正弦波、三角波、锯齿波等波形和各种淡入淡出算法，让进度条变得悦耳动听
替換nvda原生難聽的進度條，並提供包括鄭嫌撥、三角波、鋸齒波等波形，以及各種淡入淡出算法來使進度條變的悅耳
